Hi, my name is Cindy Juarez.

I am a front-end engineer in ATX.

About

I love building empowering, functional, efficient, and thoughtfully designed web applications using semantic HTML, scalable/reusable CSS, and modern JavaScript. Also, I tend to work remotely.

There are some great engineers that I've worked with that have good things to say about me. So, that's pretty cool.

I currently live in Austin with my husband and dog. I love JavaScript. I enjoy running, drinking coffee, eating waffles, and traveling.
